title: Guthix (disambiguation)
content:
Guthix may refer to:

  • Guthix, a god
  • Tears of Guthix, a members-only quest
    • Tears of Guthix, a short Distraction and Diversion that rewards players with experience in their lowest skill
    • Tears of Guthix, a music track unlocked during the eponymous quest
    • The Tears of Guthix cavern, an area south of Lumbridge Swamp Caves
  • Fist of Guthix, a safe minigame located in the Gamers' Grotto
  • Edicts of Guthix, a series of decrees Guthix made to the world after the God wars

Weapons and armour[edit | edit source]

  • Claws of Guthix, a spell that requires level 60 Magic
  • Guthix staff, one of the three god staves
  • Staff of balance, a Guthixian bladed staff
  • Guthix cape, one of the three god capes
  • God armour, which includes five items known collectively as Guthix armour
    • Guthix full helmet
    • Guthix platebody
    • Guthix kiteshield
    • Guthix platelegs
    • Guthix plateskirt
  • Guthix crozier
  • Guthix mitre
  • Guthix mjolnir, a reward from Making History quest
  • Guthix blessed d'hide armour, an item set of Ranged armour aligned to the god Guthix consisting of:
    • Guthix coif
    • Guthix dragonhide
    • Guthix chaps
    • Guthix vambraces
    • Guthix d'hide shield
  • Guthix stole

Items[edit | edit source]

  • Guthix rest, a potion made during One Small Favour quest
  • Guthix balance potion, a modified stat restore potion
  • Guthixian icon, used in creating the staff of balance
  • Items built in the chapel:
    • Guthix icon
    • Guthix symbol
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
